title: Everyday Driver's Paul and Todd
description:
Paul Schmucker and Todd Deeken are the host of the YouTube channel, Everyday Driver, where they argue with each other about most things. They have been in the car channel game for a long, long time, do excellent comparisons. and they're great people. They've also made several long-form car films, and air some content on Amazon Prime. T

NEW SHIRTS: https://www.blipshift.com/collections/the-smoking-tire

https://www.youtube.com/user/EverydayDriver 

Watch them on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/Everyday-Driver/dp/B07C1S75GF


T: @thesmokingtire, @zackklapman @everydaydriver
IG: @thesmokingtire, @fakezackklapman@everydaydriver

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/H-tavkzfBTg
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
